casebody.data:
DISCOVERY HOUSE, INC., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. CONSOLIDATED CITY OF INDIANAPOLIS and Metropolitan Board of Zoning Appeals of Marion County, Indiana, Defendants-Appellants. No. 02-2326. United States Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. March 28, 2003.

Before BAUER, KANNE, and EVANS, Circuit Judges.

ORDER

On February 13, 2003, the plaintiff-appellee filed a petition for rehearing and petition for rehearing en banc. An answer was filed on March 13, 2003. All the judges on the original panel have voted to *633deny a rehearing, and none of the judges in active service have requested a vote on the petition for rehearing en banc. The petitions for rehearing and rehearing en banc are therefore DENIED.
